title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Short-Term Clinical Psychology Training Course Applying Ecological Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Core psychological theories and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design working alliance strategies with clients by applying an ecological perspective
Learners can establish customized intervention plans by analyzing environmental affordances in real clinical scenarios
Learners can identify constraints in person-environment interactions and propose solutions using systems thinking techniques
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
